sentences.en: A batch of rolled steel was allocated to us.
A series of batch biological reactors are used.
sentences.cn: 可用一组间歇式生物反应器.

sentences.en: Batch is the mixture of weighed materials carefully blended.
sentences.cn: 配合料是一种将已称量原料仔细混合而成的混合物.

sentences.en: Every day another batch of papers reaches the manager, demanding his attention.
sentences.cn: 每天都有一批新的文件交到经理手里，要他处理。

sentences.en: He drops an impressive - looking batch of cards down on the desk.
sentences.cn: 他把一叠厚厚的卡片扔在书桌上.

sentences.en: He has written a batch of very samey tunes.
sentences.cn: 他写了一组非常单调枯燥的曲子。

sentences.en: He received a batch of telegrams.
Here comes a fresh batch of visitors.
I have a batch of letters to answer.
She brought a large batch of newspaper cuttings.
She made a batch of her special oatmeal cookies.
sentences.cn: 她烤制了一炉拿手的燕麦甜饼.

sentences.en: Single - wafer processes use higher pressures than the batch processes.
sentences.cn: 单片工艺比多片工艺要用较高的压力.

sentences.en: The cost is not sensitive to the batch size.
sentences.cn: 价格不因整批尺寸的变化而发生波动.

sentences.en: The factory has already phased out a batch of production equipment.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂已经淘汰了一批生产设备.

sentences.en: This batch of products is well made.
We baked a batch of rolls.

words.tran_cn: 一批；一炉；一次所制之量

phrases.tran_cn: 批处理模式；成批处理方式
分批工艺，分批法；批流程
成批处理；整批处理；分批加工
批量生产；成批生产；间歇生产

trans.tran_en: a group of people or things that arrive or are dealt with together
